ing: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "Like a Key lime pie, but with lemon juice. You can garnish with mint leaves and lemon peel for an extra special touch."
ins: In a bowl, combine milk and lemon juice; mix until smooth (mixture will begin to thicken). Fold in whipped topping; spoon into crust. Chill until ready to serve, at least 4 hours or overnight.
